p: The SAT cooling seen in the 100% mid latitude deforestation scenario is in general agreement with previous studies [ 12, 25], albeit the 0.077 K reduction in temperature at 2100 recorded by our experiments is larger than the 0.04 K cooling produced by comparable simulations [ 12]. Our experiments generated albedo increases of 1% to 5%, within the range range of earlier efforts that found increases of 4.7% to 5% [ 12].
